title: Học tiếng Anh  Jack Ma khuyên chọn sếp tốt thay vì công ty tốt
description: 20-30 tuổi  bạn hãy tìm sếp tốt chứ không phải một công ty tốt  Hãy học hỏi từ ông ta  Jack Ma khuyên  Hãy nghe và điền từ còn thiếu
content: Jack Ma  Life is an experience  To me  if you’re a student  the best …(4)… If you are 20 – 30 years old  you should find a good boss  not necessary a good company  A good boss is better than a good company  A lot of good companies do not have a lot of good bosses  Find a good boss  …(5)… If you are 30 – 40 years old  you want to do something yourself  just do it  When you are 40 – 50 years old  you have to do something that you are …(6)… When you are 50 – 60 years old  you should give …(7)… When you are over 60 years old  spend time with your …(9)… But any time is a good time for being …(10)… If you start early  have experience  and then go back to study  we're just fine  I like that  >>
